gameDetails.name: Ghost Stories: Chuck No-Rice
gameDetails.description: Originally available as a PDF download from the Repos Productions website as an April Fool Joke, this promo card for Ghost Stories was handed out at GenCon 2009 at the Asmodee booth.  Chuck is a 5-red tao Wu Feng incarnation, who kills adjacent ghosts when he comes into play, removes one Qi from each monk in the column in front of him each activation, and provide no reward, other than his signature.
